bug.question: I have six legs and can crawl. I love to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I transform into something beautiful.
🍃 I'm often found on plants.
🎨 My colors can be very bright.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger, so be careful!

hints.text: 🌼 I visit flowers.
💛 I am known for my sweet product.
🐝 I buzz around.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. Farmers love me because I eat aphids. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have a pattern of dots.
🐞 I am considered lucky by some.
🌱 I protect plants.

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. I am green and live in grassy fields.

hints.text: 🎵 You might hear me singing in the summer.
🦵 I have strong legs.
🟢 I blend in with the grass.

bug.question: I march in long lines and carry food. I live in a colony with my family.

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but very strong.
🏠 I build underground tunnels.
💪 We work together as a team.

bug.question: I fly at night and am attracted to light. People think I am scary, but I am important to the food chain

hints.text: 🌑 I am nocturnal.
🔦 I am drawn to lamps.
🦋 Some people think I am a boring butterfly.

bug.question: I have large wings and can hover in the air. I eat smaller insects. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I often live near water.
👁️ My eyes are very big.
💨 I am a fast flier.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and branches. I wait patiently to catch my prey.

hints.text: 🌿 I look like a part of a plant.
🙏 Some people think I am always praying.
🦗 I eat other bugs.

bug.question: I light up the night with a gentle glow. I am small and fly around in the summer.

hints.text: ✨ I have a light in my tail.
🌃 You can see me best when it's dark.
💚 My light helps me find a mate.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. Some people eat me, and I live in the water.

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
🦞 Some species of me are very large.
🌊 I am a type of crustacean.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I can give you shade. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very big and tall.
☀️ Birds like to sit in me.
🍃 I have many leaves.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be red, yellow, or white, and bees love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I smell very sweet.
🪴 People give me as gifts.
🫙 Vases like to hold me.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm often orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🧑‍🍳 You can make juice from me.
👀 Eating me helps you see in the dark

plant.question: I have a stalk and leaves that make a crunchy salad, and I am long and green. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I'm often in your salad!
🥒 I'm related to a cucumber.
🫙 I'm sometimes pickled

plant.question: I have seeds on the outside, but I'm red and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I am a small, yummy fruit.
🍦 I taste good with ice cream.
❤️ I am the color of love.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant with a rough trunk and branches, and I make my own food from sunlight. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can be used to build houses.
🦉 Owls like to live in me
🍁 I lose leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be used to make a drink. My leaves are green and dried. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 I'm often served hot.
☕ People drink me in the morning.
🌱 My leaves are used to make the drink

plant.question: I'm a plant that grows in water, and I have a bulb. Ducks like to eat my roots. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I am home to many birds!
🐸 I often have frogs sitting on me
🏵️ My flower is big and beautiful.

plant.question: I am a desert plant with thick skin and sharp needles, able to survive long without water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 You can find me in Arizona.
🏜️ I'm built for hot, dry weather.
💧 I store water inside of me.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant with long vines. I produce a fruit that is made into chocolate. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am a sweet treat.
🌍 My seeds are found in tropical regions.
🐒 Monkeys also like my fruit.
